sense.def:
To occupy a building
pomeni živeti ali delati v stavbi.

seg.quote: Houses occupied by the aged must be centrally heated.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer sedež,
is occupied
, nekdo tisto uporablja, tako da ni na voljo drugim.

To occupy a place or a country
pomeni priti na neki kraj ali v neko državo in tam prevzeti oblast.

seg.quote: The students occupied the Administration Block.

sense.def:
To occupy a particular place in a system, process, or plan
pomeni biti na določenem mestu v sistemu, procesu ali načrtu.

seg.quote: The demonstration occupies a central place in their campaign.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To occupy oneself in doing something
pomeni dati si opraviti z neko dejavnostjo.

cit.quote: zaposliti se s čim, ukvarjati se

seg.quote: They were occupying themselves in growing their own food.
How do you occupy your time?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
occupies someone
, mora človek tistemu nameniti določen napor, pozornost ali čas.
